data.name: In Good Company - Conversation with Akash Saxena, Head of Engg, DisneyPlus HotStar
data.summary:
Akash Saxena, Head of Engg, DisneyPlus, HotStar talks to Aditya Sengupta, CTO, Instamojo, about building streaming tech for a concurrent viewership of 25.3M Indians (India-NZ semis, @ICC
 ODI WC), and how to manage tech costs in a post-Covid world.
